item.title: A Survival Guide to Zig Performance Profiling on Apple Silicon (M1/M2)
item.description: Performance profiling for Zig on Apple Silicon (M1/M2) can be challenging as common tools like perf and valgrind are not supported. This guide introduces alternatives like Samply, poop, and Tracy to help you analyze and optimize your Zig code on macOS.
